parcel_id.description: A unique identifier for the property parcel as assigned by the local assessor or jurisdiction.

prior_parcel_id.description: The parcel identification number (parcel ID or folio) that was previously assigned to the property before it was changed due to a split, combination, renumbering, or administrative update by the property appraiser.
